Hi there,

It takes a team to execute a successful email program. You may be focused on the API, while your teammate is tasked with deliverability, and another owns reporting metrics. Now everyone can collaborate and work together with user roles.

Invite your teammates ( https://documentation.mailgun.com/docs/mailgun/user-manual/get-started/?utm_campaign=mg_onboarding_free&utm_medium=email&utm_source=cio#managing-user-roles ) and manage their access by choosing their user role like admin, analyst, billing, support, or developer.

Happy collaborating,
The Mailgun Team

messages.snippet: We're getting ready for the launch of the third cohort of the SaasRise B2B SaaS Growth Program this Thursday May 22. It's the last chance to get aboard the growth program for this summer and
messages.subject: We Begin Thursday
messages.textContent:
We’re getting ready for the launch of the third cohort of the SaasRise [B2B SaaS Growth Program](https://www.saasrise.com/growthprogram?utm_source=saasrise&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=we-begin-thursday) this Thursday May 22.

It’s the last chance to get aboard the growth program for this summer and make digital ads + AI personalized outbound work for your firm in the 2nd half of 2025.

If you and/or your marketing team would like to join, be sure to apply by the end of the day at [https://www.saasrise.com/growthprogram](https://www.saasrise.com/growthprogram?utm_source=saasrise&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=we-begin-thursday). Up to four people per company can attend.

In this 16 week Done-With-You program we will show you and your marketing team how to set up ABM lead list building, AI personalized outbound email and LinkedIn, and unit economics-based profitable ad campaigns on Meta, LinkedIn, Google, Adroll, and Bing.

It’s the same system we’ve used to help scale up 60+ B2B SaaS firms so far including Clearstream, Instantly, Omnisend, Ontraport, RNL, RXNT and many others.

We’ll be meeting on Zoom every Thursday at 1pm ET.

Here are some member results from the last program:

  * 305k ABM lead list built, 44 demos booked, 10 proposals out, 3 closed customers so far - Kyle Frederickson, MD at Reviewr

  * 700k ABM lead list built, 120 leads generated, and 13 new customers closed so far - Lolly Taylor, EVP of RevOps at Skykit

  * 100 discovery calls booked in the last month from Meta Ads alone - Joel VanderPol, Chief Revenue Officer at Exercise.com

These companies have now built sustainable and scalable new channels for customer acquisition.

To join cohort 3 — [apply here](https://www.saasrise.com/growthprogram?utm_source=saasrise&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=we-begin-thursday).

The cost is $5k/mo for four months. The benefit is a material increase in enterprise value IF you can get your CPL and CAC within your targets from the new customer acquisition channels (which is what we work on together for four months to nail).

Here are a few results from cohort #2 which just wrapped up…

[![](https://assets.buttondown.email/images/2bd5c14b-a37b-4859-a9aa-4adc462c2b78.png?w=960&fit=max)](https://www.saasrise.com/growthprogram?utm_source=saasrise&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=we-begin-thursday)Actual results from Cohort #2  
[![](https://assets.buttondown.email/images/4a9ae750-d484-460b-a05a-facf24f81754.png?w=960&fit=max)](https://www.saasrise.com/growthprogram?utm_source=saasrise&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=we-begin-thursday)Testimonials from the last program

If you’re a B2B software firm with an ACV between $1k and $300,000 — come join us for the next program starting this week.

Just apply at [https://www.saasrise.com/growthprogram](https://www.saasrise.com/growthprogram?utm_source=saasrise&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=we-begin-thursday)

And once you’re accepted, be sure to enroll right away as registration closes in 48 hours.

Here’s to your growth,  
Ryan Allis, CEO  
[**SaasRise**](https://saasrise.com/?utm_source=saasrise&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=we-begin-thursday) \- The Community for SaaS CEOs & Founders  
[**GrowthRise**](https://growthrise.com/?utm_source=saasrise&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=we-begin-thursday)**** - The Community for B2B Marketers

_P.S. - Next week we will be back to our regular weekly emails on the topic of how to grow, scale, and exit your software company — as well as recaps on our weekly community mastermind calls (come join us!)._

–––
This was issue #91 of SaasRise.

You can [subscribe](https://buttondown.com/saasrise), [unsubscribe](https://buttondown.com/unsubscribe/d7804b57-2a54-4c95-9d3a-931c591f0ceb?email=4913700d-c1f3-4eca-80b1-83d836c0988d), or [view this email online](https://buttondown.com/saasrise/subscribers/d7804b57-2a54-4c95-9d3a-931c591f0ceb/archive/we-begin-thursday).

–––
This email brought to you by Buttondown, the easiest way to
start and grow your newsletter: https://buttondown.com

messages.snippet: Find secure images purpose-built for modern production environments with Docker Hardened Images. Docker Hardened Image Stop Chasing CVEs. Start Securing with Docker Hardened Images. Introducing Docker
messages.subject: Introducing Docker Hardened Images: Secure. Minimal. Production-Ready.
messages.textContent:
<https://em.docker.com/NzkwLVNTQi0zNzUAAAGaiEy829-FXwD_-DROF11s6BsB_bB4BGCqxG9GHQJCK9cqAFC35n7wKEGlKrvk-7HZ6yFaMJY=>
Stop Chasing CVEs.
Start Securing with Docker Hardened Images.
Introducing Docker Hardened Images (DHI) — secure-by-default container images built for modern production environments.

With up to 95% less attack surface, Docker Hardened Images are curated, maintained, and continuously updated to ensure near-zero known CVEs. Following the distroless model, they contain no shell or package manager — just what your app needs to run securely. They’re also fully compatible with popular distros like Alpine and Debian, so you can integrate them seamlessly without retooling.

With Docker Hardened Images, you get:



	-  Run Open Source with Confidence – Each image is automatically rebuilt and retested with upstream changes, then signed and attested via a SLSA Level 3–compliant build system to ensure tamper-proof delivery.
	- Faster Developer Velocity – Eliminate patching busywork and reduce scanner noise. Focus on shipping, not chasing CVEs.
	- Production-Ready from Day One – Easily customize images with your certificates, configs, and packages.
	- Zero-Friction Migration – Just update a line in your Dockerfile. No rewrites. No retraining. No disruption.
Want to Learn More First?

messages.snippet: To ensure optimal data reporting for Meta Audience Network, reset your Meta account login. Here's what you need to do. Reset your Meta account login​​​​​​ To ensure optimal LevelPlay data reporting
messages.subject: Reset your Meta account login
messages.textContent:
To ensure optimal data reporting for Meta Audience Network, reset your Meta account login. Here's what you need to do.

Reset your Meta account login​​​​​​
To ensure optimal LevelPlay data reporting for Meta Audience Network, reset your Meta account login.

Here’s what you need to do:

	Go to the Networks page and select Meta from the list of networks

	Click Reset login

	In the Facebook Login for Business modal, select the business portfolio connected to your LevelPlay account and then click Continue

	Select all Properties you monetize through LevelPlay

	Click Continue > Save > Got it

Make sure you complete these steps every time you add an app that you want to monetize through LevelPlay to your Meta account.

Ad delivery will continue regardless of when you reset your login through the steps listed above.

You may see an increase in revenue from Meta Audience Network after completing the steps above because your LevelPlay account will have more complete access to the apps in your Meta account.

For any questions, contact your account manager.

 

Unity 
​​​​116 New Montgomery Street
San Francisco, CA
messages.htmlContent:
To ensure optimal data reporting for Meta Audience Network, reset your Meta account login. Here's what you need to do.

Reset your Meta account login​​​​​​

 

To ensure optimal LevelPlay data reporting for Meta Audience Network, reset your Meta account login.

Here’s what you need to do:

  1. On LevelPlay, go to the Networks page and select Meta from the list of networks
  2. Click Reset login > Login with Meta
  3. In the Facebook Login for Business modal, select the business portfolio connected to your LevelPlay account and then click Continue
  4. Select all Properties you monetize through LevelPlay
  5. Click Continue > Save > Got it

Make sure you complete these steps every time you add an app that you want to monetize through LevelPlay to your Meta account.

Ad delivery will continue regardless of when you reset your login through the steps listed above.

You may see an increase in reported revenue from Meta Audience Network after completing the steps above because your LevelPlay account will have more complete access to the apps in your Meta account.

For any questions, contact your account manager.

 

Unity 
​​​​116 New Montgomery Street

San Francisco, CA

messages.textContent:
Here’s a quick checklist to help you prepare.

Screenshot 2025-05-20 at 12.30.04 PM (https://d5llC804.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/DQ+113/d5llC804/VXbDPQ4fBJMHW3bSNMS121lP-W7FnbcL5wQy03N7bK2-g3lcq-W5BW0B06lZ3lmW4RFGlm1zqYTtW6DwCTS2fqgQ5N7z0jDltQC1DW8JFQ7l8STX0PW24sfjx2VCTgSVdDr1k8Dk5n6W3BhLSr4W9lkhW3L-YXN36x1PKW2B_c4b6BPpvSW1VVH_v3w692jW8_dL-j337l1tW1_dxhY20kKJDW4P5pNQ5PhcmxW3-vGCx97695BW73b7vy894mRTW9fjGYp4rdhNZN9h33CQ6-lkKW7Kt6N24sgYm0f5qTxzR04 )

Hey there,

It’s hard to overstate how excited we are in these final days before the hackathon begins. The Bolt community is so pumped, that they've even made a hype track (https://d5llC804.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/DQ+113/d5llC804/VXbDPQ4fBJMHW3bSNMS121lP-W7FnbcL5wQy03N7bK2_s3lcq-W7Y8-PT6lZ3p3W53793m2N-T1BW45D5Fn5K0vKJW51Q6rn68V79zW8c78T552XRJjW3Jy59y6XnVDDV7712r3sBH_hW691f8T7BxXDFW6f4Qrb5QxjS-W4SZX716YYhgYW14nt7B7rXpGPW1myr4s2LkvY4W18F21W4jLsRJW4HyCQx5c9v5ZN1YwYg57yfx0N1mxBr3Hb67FW4qp4YN2rRwt_W4gTkpf73YRVlW5dcTJM6c7P-mW2wNCTw6SSkbZW7xjsf67z1vXMW5bMGZ27VYcZBW136xSP6m4VwHW4p9_0W6vVvD9W4j-zhX4LVJLPW7mYN1b417NqgW2MkxRz3JvnfCf6s0HmT04 ) . Are you ready to make something amazing?!

Here’s a handy to-do list to make sure you’re ready for May 30:

✅ Make sure you’re registered (https://d5llC804.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/DQ+113/d5llC804/VXbDPQ4fBJMHW3bSNMS121lP-W7FnbcL5wQy03N7bK2-z3lcq-W69sMD-6lZ3kZW6XvDbc71txVJW8cJ0qn32wT5NW3bS-Pf88nQ_JW4P2MTz7KbzygW8gTQN91MnSYDW7cvjLQ538hSrMcZ8txQC0MJW3lBg5829mgQxW5Fx-r140zpl4N2yP2RgB9WSxW6zml5K94VWxtW2GM6bz3M_DnhW5VxSD68gq0JkW2X0CCv4gp_dXW3WHYKj16KH1rW8PcBR843LK9mW498mmD5H-nRYW62G68f3dzXfGN23tMgHK99JdW4Px7ks4w1MPlf3qsYHC04 ) for the hackathon!! Not sure? This event is for everyone, not just engineers, coders, or full stack developers. Our goal is to have zero barriers to entry, so whether you’re a PM, a designer, a front-end visualizer, a back-end warrior, a life hacker, a self-made maker, a vibe coder, or just a person with a good idea: you’re already the right fit.

Bolt-Flowchart-Meme-V2 (https://d5llC804.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/DQ+113/d5llC804/VXbDPQ4fBJMHW3bSNMS121lP-W7FnbcL5wQy03N7bK2-z3lcq-W69sMD-6lZ3kZW6XvDbc71txVJW8cJ0qn32wT5NW3bS-Pf88nQ_JW4P2MTz7KbzygW8gTQN91MnSYDW7cvjLQ538hSrMcZ8txQC0MJW3lBg5829mgQxW5Fx-r140zpl4N2yP2RgB9WSxW6zml5K94VWxtW2GM6bz3M_DnhW5VxSD68gq0JkW2X0CCv4gp_dXW3WHYKj16KH1rW8PcBR843LK9mW498mmD5H-nRYW62G68f3dzXfGN23tMgHK99JdW4Px7ks4w1MPlf3qsYHC04 )

✅ Decide if you’re building solo, or would like to find a team (https://d5llC804.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/DQ+113/d5llC804/VXbDPQ4fBJMHW3bSNMS121lP-W7FnbcL5wQy03N7bK2-z3lcq-W69sMD-6lZ3mlW2__vJr2RN_C8VfXfG-5x2BNNW6l8sgV41P_gSW7krfj62pjdDJW7Gv-9t6lzwlJW2kGJQ81xg0GwW1P4c2F5wlGBrW6mWqnC6ntgTcW2NX7438lr3BpW7DjtD13mSXv3W7Gcrj119nl-6W6VkD741vpT1YW1Y4znV3B8vNZW4vw60t9bBX6JN8DSYSJr7ThVN2Zl0y7F4RMdW48xJJr3xVPBMW1rfRMv1LGKk4VDVvsl1RFVGcW5PlrnH1vNfQ3f4TN3Sz04 ) of builders to join (either way, a local meetup is a great place to meet, collab, and collab). We've got 60+ IRL community meetups happening worldwide and RSVPs are filling quickly, so grab a spot fast if you haven’t already!

Bolt_Headliner_4x5_V2 (https://d5llC804.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/DQ+113/d5llC804/VXbDPQ4fBJMHW3bSNMS121lP-W7FnbcL5wQy03N7bK2-z3lcq-W69sMD-6lZ3nmW3PJL2b7WJ2NpW6Nf_jZ4kvywfW82_KdG5jRC2PW5vT6rB5hj_5cW5v3Kym45f_3RW4zjjCR7WmKpQW75gvjn8-L6fsW25q6tH2XrsQ8W6wnvVm8LGlc8VQylNF8NBdN-W4cfWll8MqxQ_W6nMyCl305VTZW6_krVw901rfnW1fprTl3vl_9VW4ymVr464Jq78N40cBtVf0KwvW6Bwk-G278rmDN3rZYDxKdFQ1VXK2c07qG5bMW7d9_Vd5xSDQ-f2D53GP04 )

✅ Dream up your idea for the hackathon. The next hype social platform? A modern personal finance tracker? A charitable app that leaves a positive mark on the world?!

✅ Start prototyping (https://d5llC804.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/DQ+113/d5llC804/VXbDPQ4fBJMHW3bSNMS121lP-W7FnbcL5wQy03N7bK2-g3lcq-W5BW0B06lZ3lmW4RFGlm1zqYTtW6DwCTS2fqgQ5N7z0jDltQC1DW8JFQ7l8STX0PW24sfjx2VCTgSVdDr1k8Dk5n6W3BhLSr4W9lkhW3L-YXN36x1PKW2B_c4b6BPpvSW1VVH_v3w692jW8_dL-j337l1tW1_dxhY20kKJDW4P5pNQ5PhcmxW3-vGCx97695BW73b7vy894mRTW9fjGYp4rdhNZN9h33CQ6-lkKW7Kt6N24sgYm0f5qTxzR04 ) ! Free Bolt tokens and other helpful tools will be coming soon exclusively for participants, but we’d recommend that you be familiar with using Bolt before that. Feeling fuzzy on the details? Here’s a great intro (https://d5llC804.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/DQ+113/d5llC804/VXbDPQ4fBJMHW3bSNMS121lP-W7FnbcL5wQy03N7bK2-T3lcq-W6N1vHY6lZ3mgW2f5rRZ31L_9vW7l4K1H2pXd_WW4gKvtl6p6pQPW3p3sHg6nBtBvW21pPp63skFxvW6cSqcb3NdBhhW8XXybn6yMmtfW8LSkYv4PclXtW4K2lRL37hbFXW4b8zht4slY8cW8y7c0t91bhwHN5QCy9rDpV2ZVtvxVD14bTp1W7VPBvV1mgVV7N2CbS1zf2NsrW47Ll_64801C_W90FFBJ25PpN3W9kG8jm8N_ghHW4V4xD-8-SDRbW66CVD59hgTVkW7TKTVS1nnHCTW1PjYTn2mKGgmf6GW0xM04 ) you can read, or check out this video, Building an App from Scratch with Bolt.new (Full Beginners Guide):

Screenshot 2025-05-20 at 11.51.46 AM (https://d5llC804.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/DQ+113/d5llC804/VXbDPQ4fBJMHW3bSNMS121lP-W7FnbcL5wQy03N7bK2-T3lcq-W6N1vHY6lZ3mpW42H4M97dHc_7W6HjTny6nF-yLW5c2QCL2xdmK3W412hWp84kPm1W8z7yXy4Bnw-JW7mxl6X84H-fwW5KVnFd4Gb07gW4FD4H23ppYz3W5wHyRS6VC85vW70hgK679PT48W3ch9sJ1nqhrMW14vKxw6dlXqWW82CGYY1JsS3MW71pGzJ6LWXgnW898pNV7Y9Dl0W8Klx2z3mbMMpW3pS2D1491zKPW2SbrMl3BW7R0W46Q5dn8xX7LsW1kHMkW7_JZJBW2sxQs86RKq0FW8VVVt04g0478dyz9P004 )

✅ Attend our AMA livestream (https://d5llC804.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/DQ+113/d5llC804/VXbDPQ4fBJMHW3bSNMS121lP-W7FnbcL5wQy03N7bK2_s3lcq-W7Y8-PT6lZ3nSW5srzkY1n4D1cW8LLqZw4N-dftW2_wgT150FP7nW1w3mdC4JlrhxW1fVH0d7jwQ1FW2tKMml1FkFgkN3dwQb9V1lnfW8QJfZq2vWcNCW2Qnf3J6kfTTMW1V1mhr1RsshqW79CCN37kfCfzW6hSr1h1M2km0W6WjC2C1szS0HW98wSMJ8YfgjmW1wN8YJ3t0f4HW9jlq_m7fP7n2W8x19R67lCS0mW4060VL59z4kMW8Z43K_97H6_TW6WhPjm7nQcGCW35s1wS2rn5tJW6z_fWQ8kBhG5W9dyHVw39qnKSW4QbXn17h40bcW7zD15j9kL1D4V1tsS09kVgFjf6xjwVb04 ) tomorrow, May 21! Members of the Bolt and River teams will be sharing more details about the event, mentors, rules, guidelines, and more. ​This is a great opportunity to bring questions you might have as you prepare.

Screenshot 2025-05-20 at 11.54.17 AM (https://d5llC804.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/DQ+113/d5llC804/VXbDPQ4fBJMHW3bSNMS121lP-W7FnbcL5wQy03N7bK2_s3lcq-W7Y8-PT6lZ3nSW5srzkY1n4D1cW8LLqZw4N-dftW2_wgT150FP7nW1w3mdC4JlrhxW1fVH0d7jwQ1FW2tKMml1FkFgkN3dwQb9V1lnfW8QJfZq2vWcNCW2Qnf3J6kfTTMW1V1mhr1RsshqW79CCN37kfCfzW6hSr1h1M2km0W6WjC2C1szS0HW98wSMJ8YfgjmW1wN8YJ3t0f4HW9jlq_m7fP7n2W8x19R67lCS0mW4060VL59z4kMW8Z43K_97H6_TW6WhPjm7nQcGCW35s1wS2rn5tJW6z_fWQ8kBhG5W9dyHVw39qnKSW4QbXn17h40bcW7zD15j9kL1D4V1tsS09kVgFjf6xjwVb04 )

CEO & Co-Founder, Bolt.new (https://d5llC804.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/DQ+113/d5llC804/VXbDPQ4fBJMHW3bSNMS121lP-W7FnbcL5wQy03N7bK2-g3lcq-W5BW0B06lZ3lmW4RFGlm1zqYTtW6DwCTS2fqgQ5N7z0jDltQC1DW8JFQ7l8STX0PW24sfjx2VCTgSVdDr1k8Dk5n6W3BhLSr4W9lkhW3L-YXN36x1PKW2B_c4b6BPpvSW1VVH_v3w692jW8_dL-j337l1tW1_dxhY20kKJDW4P5pNQ5PhcmxW3-vGCx97695BW73b7vy894mRTW9fjGYp4rdhNZN9h33CQ6-lkKW7Kt6N24sgYm0f5qTxzR04 )

messages.htmlContent:
Here’s a quick checklist to help you prepare.

Hey there,

It’s hard to overstate how excited we are in these final days before the hackathon begins. The Bolt community is so pumped, that they've even made a hype track. Are you ready to make something amazing?! 

 

Here’s a handy to-do list to make sure you’re ready for May 30:

 

✅ Make sure you’re registered for the hackathon!! Not sure? This event is for everyone, not just engineers, coders, or full stack developers. Our goal is to have zero barriers to entry, so whether you’re a PM, a designer, a front-end visualizer, a back-end warrior, a life hacker, a self-made maker, a vibe coder, or just a person with a good idea: you’re already the right fit.

✅ Decide if you’re building solo, or would like to find a team of builders to join (either way, a local meetup is a great place to meet, collab, and collab). We've got 60+ IRL community meetups happening worldwide and RSVPs are filling quickly, so grab a spot fast if you haven’t already!

    ✅ Dream up your idea for the hackathon. The next hype social platform? A modern personal finance tracker? A charitable app that leaves a positive mark on the world?!


    ✅ Start prototyping! Free Bolt tokens and other helpful tools will be coming soon exclusively for participants, but we’d recommend that you be familiar with using Bolt before that. Feeling fuzzy on the details? Here’s a great intro you can read, or check out this video, Building an App from Scratch with Bolt.new (Full Beginners Guide):

    ✅ Attend our AMA livestream tomorrow, May 21! Members of the Bolt and River teams will be sharing more details about the event, mentors, rules, guidelines, and more. ​This is a great opportunity to bring questions you might have as you prepare.

    Stay tuned in just a few days for our announcement of event sponsors, award categories, and prizing 👀

    Rock on,

    Eric Simons
    CEO & Co-Founder, Bolt.new

    StackBlitz, Inc., 2443 Fillmore Street #380-16814, San Francisco, CA, 94115, United States. To opt out of future emails from StackBlitz, click here to unsubscribe.

messages.subject: Base44 Updates
messages.textContent:
*****************
✨ Base44 Updates🚀
*****************

Hey Yossi,

Base44 just got better. Here's what's new:

*🔌 Integration Catalog*

Connect Base44 to your favorite external services and APIs, creating powerful workflows that extend your applications beyond our platform.

*💰 Affiliate Program Launch*

Earn while you share! Invite others to Base44 and earn a reward when they subscribe. Partners get a special dashboard access and promotional materials. Join the program → ( https://base44.getrewardful.com/signup )

*⏱️ Version History*

Never lose your work again! You can now view and restore previous versions of your projects, making experimentation risk-free.

*🤖 New Models + Selection Control*

Choose the specific AI model for your project or let Base44 intelligently select the best one for your needs. More options, more power!

*🌐 Domain Purchase Integration*

Launch faster with our new domain purchasing feature. Buy and configure domains directly within Base44 - no more switching between services.

Try New Features Now ( https://app.base44.com )

-------------------
Join our community!
-------------------

Follow us on Twitter ( https://x.com/base_44 ) Join our Discord channel ( https://discord.gg/vXHPqVZM )

messages.subject: The New Era of Growth Strategy at Gamesforum Hamburg
messages.textContent:
How the smartest studios are achieving scalable and sustainable growth.

Gamesforum Hamburg (https://d37hdH04.eu1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/2O+113/d37hdH04/VVF9rp2c7DFDW1K764244_7VsV3Z50p5wP-9CN9cd5HF3pyd0W7Y8-PT6lZ3lwW622CzS1pQlWtW6J00wn3P-TkfN3sXw0p-2BkkW47q0mK4kr4PQW1lWQk-94cQGkN2tpSl1GcXZfW4sn73x1QbPWDW2XMHVh83dhRDN8ndyNQ8RCkyW27mt769bQVbxW3qHQLt1bS_rhW7cHN9n35Lp9yW8yX0TL2TfK7FW7WCg2Z3bkfbzW5kH3wd3S5lt-W8BKQ_059m27vW3W6HBN95yk_cW3r87C98RHRF0W3GfwJR28v6FcW7cXq0m3__RdQW50xFsf33Wkd6W1R5fjF8xzx3RVfnFGg8SPttgN6tq2mfxdJRGW7wY-kd2QT1kWW3KxB026rB8Xwf6JNfGF04 )

Yossi, is your game growth strategy built for the future?

The mobile games landscape is more competitive than ever. With shifting user behaviour, rising acquisition costs, a one-size-fits-all approach no longer works. Success in 2025 and beyond demands genre-focused strategies.

As the premier event for the mobile gaming industry, Gamesforum Hamburg returns for a third year, bringing you a revamped agenda with a sharp focus on user acquisition and monetization strategies—tailored by game genre.

Join top studios and publishers—including Stillfront Group, Sunday, and Activision Blizzard—as they share how they're:

✅ Turning unfilled ad inventory into value

✅ Aligning siloed teams around full-funnel growth

✅ Building strategies from first ad impression through Day-7 and beyond

View Agenda
(https://d37hdH04.eu1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/2O+113/d37hdH04/VVF9rp2c7DFDW1K764244_7VsV3Z50p5wP-9CN9cd5HF3pyd0W7Y8-PT6lZ3l8W64MRkk7yDmHzW9fRJC32hf0M-W2zkDY75dS7yyW3vVsNl2mjZ5NW6PsyRH8S3tf2W1VD4ll32NxpjW4bvYVP2X8KxTW4GYzWP35011WW8xw68767fCx_W7909Ck8sjfjPW25QrHq9btLqKW75ywV965yRg0W1t2pVD1rrQF_W4jH_tK6kDG1hW5Smgt-7BPv6JVPKqml481t1KW3wRg3T1Qwpj7W3kT7rP107qPSN7kQpblCTdWVVrCxBL1mrb9BW8L4d698dsYH2W2Kj1r58C6w3kW4SFLq_3N63KnF5P8ZqsbV_wW7p-1H-5n73MZN6D-y-8M4l6bf1GgSB204 )

Max Dewavrin (https://d37hdH04.eu1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/2O+113/d37hdH04/VVF9rp2c7DFDW1K764244_7VsV3Z50p5wP-9CN9cd5HF3pyd0W7Y8-PT6lZ3lwW622CzS1pQlWtW6J00wn3P-TkfN3sXw0p-2BkkW47q0mK4kr4PQW1lWQk-94cQGkN2tpSl1GcXZfW4sn73x1QbPWDW2XMHVh83dhRDN8ndyNQ8RCkyW27mt769bQVbxW3qHQLt1bS_rhW7cHN9n35Lp9yW8yX0TL2TfK7FW7WCg2Z3bkfbzW5kH3wd3S5lt-W8BKQ_059m27vW3W6HBN95yk_cW3r87C98RHRF0W3GfwJR28v6FcW7cXq0m3__RdQW50xFsf33Wkd6W1R5fjF8xzx3RVfnFGg8SPttgN6tq2mfxdJRGW7wY-kd2QT1kWW3KxB026rB8Xwf6JNfGF04 )

Max Dewavrin

Marketing Consultant

The game genre format is particularly insightful, as what holds true for one vertical may not apply to another.

Game mechanics vary significantly across genres. Breaking things down by genre is crucial, offering Gamesforum attendees the chance to uncover more targeted, actionable insights.

Who's Attending?

🐣 Early Bird Tickets End This Friday

Hamburg Tickets (https://d37hdH04.eu1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/2O+113/d37hdH04/VVF9rp2c7DFDW1K764244_7VsV3Z50p5wP-9CN9cd5HF3pyd0W7Y8-PT6lZ3lwW622CzS1pQlWtW6J00wn3P-TkfN3sXw0p-2BkkW47q0mK4kr4PQW1lWQk-94cQGkN2tpSl1GcXZfW4sn73x1QbPWDW2XMHVh83dhRDN8ndyNQ8RCkyW27mt769bQVbxW3qHQLt1bS_rhW7cHN9n35Lp9yW8yX0TL2TfK7FW7WCg2Z3bkfbzW5kH3wd3S5lt-W8BKQ_059m27vW3W6HBN95yk_cW3r87C98RHRF0W3GfwJR28v6FcW7cXq0m3__RdQW50xFsf33Wkd6W1R5fjF8xzx3RVfnFGg8SPttgN6tq2mfxdJRGW7wY-kd2QT1kWW3KxB026rB8Xwf6JNfGF04 )

Don't miss out on curated sessions designed just for you.

Register today to save €110 on your ticket and guarantee your place at Gamesforum Hamburg 2025.

Register Now
(https://d37hdH04.eu1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/2O+113/d37hdH04/VVF9rp2c7DFDW1K764244_7VsV3Z50p5wP-9CN9cd5HY3pyd0W8wLKSR6lZ3kQW7BcWc-90McTRW1mnRzD6N7lc-W2jfqw742sH8gW8jyK5869WZMfW5cLhpf26V3hxW6QbcFn7j8n6wW5w6mBH18j_32W5dKG6R4-rhc2W6N-3kt6K-z9zW3xr81L75ZxknW95Hm8Y3cxMTKW96M-MG3WxkDBN3dVPWG3RN3dW1lLjTq1lSsfPW6525VG7W6wb7W4BYDQG3wXT92W8VcTZS91MbYtW23hdJk2WYYldN4_cZSr31RJ_W45W7zn3JZKbFW5Pz-Vq79Zv2rW710fYT8JPzK6W7XQTH18qH9GvW9krdHJ6Vm2-MW3vTr0Y7MNwlZW7M9zJn6R0F7hVPm_KP2LNnXFN1SVQtxG9D44d56vrz04 )

messages.htmlContent:
How the smartest studios are achieving scalable and sustainable growth.

Yossi, is your game growth strategy built for the future?

The mobile games landscape is more competitive than ever. With shifting user behaviour, rising acquisition costs, a one-size-fits-all approach no longer works. Success in 2025 and beyond demands genre-focused strategies.

 

As the premier event for the mobile gaming industry, Gamesforum Hamburg returns for a third year, bringing you a revamped agenda with a sharp focus on user acquisition and monetization strategies—tailored by game genre.

 

Join top studios and publishers—including Stillfront Group, Sunday, and Activision Blizzard—as they share how they're:


✅ Turning unfilled ad inventory into value
✅ Aligning siloed teams around full-funnel growth
✅ Building strategies from first ad impression through Day-7 and beyond

View Agenda
Max Dewavrin

Marketing Consultant

The game genre format is particularly insightful, as what holds true for one vertical may not apply to another.

 

Game mechanics vary significantly across genres. Breaking things down by genre is crucial, offering Gamesforum attendees the chance to uncover more targeted, actionable insights.

Who's Attending?

🐣 Early Bird Tickets End This Friday

Don't miss out on curated sessions designed just for you.

 

Register today to save €110 on your ticket and guarantee your place at Gamesforum Hamburg 2025.

Register Now

We hope to see you in Hamburg!

Many Thanks,

Gamesforum
events@globalmgf.com

Gamesforum Limited, 24 Southwark Bridge Road, London, London SE1 9HF, United Kingdom

Unsubscribe Manage preferences

messages.snippet: רשומות הממתינות לטיפולך פליי מאניה בע"מ שלום רב, חשוב לנו לעדכן אותך כי ישנם כספים שטרם שוייכו לחשבונות עובדיך. יש להשיב לנו בהקדם לפי המפורט במכתבנו המצורף, וזאת כדי למנוע פגיעה בחשבונות עובדיך.
messages.subject: הודעה בדבר כספים לא משוייכים
messages.htmlContent:
רשומות הממתינות לטיפולך
פליי מאניה בע"מ שלום רב,
חשוב לנו לעדכן אותך כי ישנם כספים שטרם שוייכו לחשבונות עובדיך.
יש להשיב לנו בהקדם לפי המפורט במכתבנו המצורף, וזאת כדי למנוע פגיעה בחשבונות עובדיך.
לתשומת ליבך, בהיעדר התייחסותך אנו ניאלץ להשיב את הכספים לחשבונך.



במידה שנדרשת סיסמא לפתיחת המסמך, יש להזין את מספר הח.פ. של המעסיק.
באפשרותך לבצע פעולות ולעקוב אחר הפקדות עובדיך באמצעות פורטל המעסיקים של הפניקס:

כניסה לפורטל הקלק כאן
במידה שאינך רשום לפורטל, ניתן להירשם כאן


מספר מזהה: VGenericUnassaign3304547

messages.subject: Introducing Claude 4
messages.textContent:
Today, we’re introducing Claude Opus 4 and Claude Sonnet 4, setting new 
standards for coding, advanced reasoning, and AI agents.










Hello,



Today, we’re introducing Claude Opus 4 and Claude Sonnet 4 
<https://www.anthropic.com/news/claude-4>, setting new standards for coding, 
advanced reasoning, and AI agents.



Here’s what we’re launching on the Anthropic API:

 * Claude Opus 4 <https://www.anthropic.com/claude/opus>: The world’s best 
coding model, with sustained performance on complex, long-running tasks and 
agent workflows.
 * Claude Sonnet 4 <https://www.anthropic.com/claude/sonnet>: A significant 
upgrade to Claude Sonnet 3.7, surpassing its predecessor across coding and 
reasoning while responding more precisely to your instructions.
 *  Extended thinking with tool use (beta): Both models can use tools during 
extended thinking, allowing Claude to alternate between reasoning and tool use 
to improve responses.
 *  New model capabilities: When given local file access, both models can now 
extract and save key facts from conversations into local 'memory files,' 
maintaining continuity across sessions and building tacit knowledge over time. 
We've also added parallel tool use and improved instruction following.
 * New API capabilities <https://anthropic.com/news/agent-capabilities-api>: 
We’re releasing four new capabilities on the Anthropic API that enable 
developers to build more powerful AI agents–the code execution tool, MCP 
connector, Files API, and the ability to cache prompts for up to one hour.
 * Priority Tier <https://docs.anthropic.com/en/api/service-tiers>: You can 
now purchase prioritized API capacity for predictable availability during 
high-demand periods.


Explore the developer docs  
<https://docs.anthropic.com/en/docs/about-claude/models/all-models>



Claude Opus 4 and Claude Sonnet 4 are now available on the Anthropic API, 
Amazon Bedrock, and Google Cloud’s Vertex AI.



To learn more, check out our blog post 
<https://www.anthropic.com/news/claude-4>, prompt engineering best practices 
<https://docs.anthropic.com/en/docs/build-with-claude/prompt-engineering/claude-4-best-practices>
, andpricing <https://www.anthropic.com/pricing#api> or watch the Code with 
Claude livestream <https://www.youtube.com/live/EvtPBaaykdo>. 



–The Anthropic Team




 <https://www.anthropic.com/?utm_source=email>

 <https://x.com/anthropicai> 
<https://www.linkedin.com/company/anthropicresearch> 
<https://www.youtube.com/@anthropic-ai>



 



This email was sent to yt@playmania.io. Unsubscribe. 
<https://links.iterable.com/s/u/dBhKaPWGLs34MpwwHWrCKOHkLx0JZbHOte0Wv2gRPQNBHfv1clwHDpXqg41396D5oiWFpgGySPPcxKPLgqI5M2I_WPoM7UAsDSFnPCLJ5rNl686d_UEpdDqwO8v8h3gfTRMFqaUtzhJyb53-SNBZUFV6ghnXODNSfM1TRYeDgenS82LIcrPbSI5qtWPshNKAemN6X58K5aj0Dq1q/LR6abA1FCXsgU5Czps3W0JqENLYqbymi/9>



Anthropic PBC, 548 Market St, PMB 90375, San Francisco, CA 94104
messages.htmlContent:
Today, we’re introducing Claude Opus 4 and Claude Sonnet 4, setting new standards for coding, advanced reasoning, and AI agents.

Hello,

 

Today, we’re introducing Claude Opus 4 and Claude Sonnet 4, setting new standards for coding, advanced reasoning, and AI agents.

 

Here’s what we’re launching on the Anthropic API:

  • Claude Opus 4: The world’s best coding model, with sustained performance on complex, long-running tasks and agent workflows.
  • Claude Sonnet 4: A significant upgrade to Claude Sonnet 3.7, surpassing its predecessor across coding and reasoning while responding more precisely to your instructions.
  • Extended thinking with tool use (beta): Both models can use tools during extended thinking, allowing Claude to alternate between reasoning and tool use to improve responses.
  • New model capabilities: When given local file access, both models can now extract and save key facts from conversations into local 'memory files,' maintaining continuity across sessions and building tacit knowledge over time. We've also added parallel tool use and improved instruction following.
  • New API capabilities: We’re releasing four new capabilities on the Anthropic API that enable developers to build more powerful AI agents–the code execution tool, MCP connector, Files API, and the ability to cache prompts for up to one hour.
  • Priority Tier: You can now purchase prioritized API capacity for predictable availability during high-demand periods. 
Explore the developer docs

Claude Opus 4 and Claude Sonnet 4 are now available on the Anthropic API, Amazon Bedrock, and Google Cloud’s Vertex AI. 

 

To learn more, check out our blog post, prompt engineering best practices, and pricing or watch the Code with Claude livestream.

 

–The Anthropic Team

 

This email was sent to yt@playmania.io. Unsubscribe. 

 

Anthropic PBC, 548 Market St, PMB 90375, San Francisco, CA 94104

-

🥈 2nd–5th Place ($75k-$22k): Incredible projects that delivered powerful ideas and beautiful execution. These teams showed excellence in both innovation and craft.

Keep your eyes on the announcements, these may be the most fun (and unexpected) ways to win.

messages.textContent:
Dear Advertiser, 
Hope this email finds you well! 
I’m reaching out to share some creative insights — including best practices and category trends — to support your growth on Mintegral.
As part of that, I’d love to introduce you to Playturbo — our in-house tool designed to help advertisers build high-performing playable creatives quickly and easily. It’s already helping many partners scale faster by streamlining production, enabling faster testing, and improving creative performance from day one. 
 
Mintegral Creative Best Practice
- We recommend uploading 3–5 sets of video creatives (including both horizontal and vertical formats), 3–5 images (with required sizes: 1200x627 and 512x512), and 1–2 playable ads per creative set.
- When launching a new offer, it’s best to start with 3 creative sets. After the learning phase, we suggest keeping 1–2 top-performing creative sets active within the offer.
- Refresh your creatives once a month.
 
Trends in the Category
- 80%+ of spend from competitors in Puzzle category is now going to playable creatives.
- Playables featuring Storyline + Native Gameplay are delivering strong results.
- Here're high-converting playable samples created by our in-house playable production tool Playturbo, for competitors in Puzzle category:
 
Empower your playable ad production with Playturbo
Create
Ready-made templates
Customizable branding
No code required
Learn more <https://www.playturbo.com/ >
Analyze
In-ad event tracking
View ad interactions, clicks, and conversions
Real-time dashboard
Learn more <https://www.playturbo.com/ >
Iterate
Edit and resize ads for deployment
Batch edit your ads
Adapt to different channels
Customizable branding
No code required
Learn more <https://www.playturbo.com/ >
 
Flexible Pricing Models
Playturbo can now support you in producing playables through flexible models:
✅ Spend Share Model
✅ Top-up Model

messages.htmlContent:
Dear Advertiser, 

Hope this email finds you well! 

I’m reaching out to share some creative insights — including best practices and category trends — to support your growth on Mintegral.

As part of that, I’d love to introduce you to Playturbo — our in-house tool designed to help advertisers build high-performing playable creatives quickly and easily. It’s already helping many partners scale faster by streamlining production, enabling faster testing, and improving creative performance from day one. 

 

Mintegral Creative Best Practice

- We recommend uploading 3–5 sets of video creatives (including both horizontal and vertical formats), 3–5 images (with required sizes: 1200x627 and 512x512), and 1–2 playable ads per creative set.

- When launching a new offer, it’s best to start with 3 creative sets. After the learning phase, we suggest keeping 1–2 top-performing creative sets active within the offer.

- Refresh your creatives once a month.

 

Trends in the Category

- 80%+ of spend from competitors in Puzzle category is now going to playable creatives.

- Playables featuring Storyline + Native Gameplay are delivering strong results.

- Here're high-converting playable samples created by our in-house playable production tool Playturbo, for competitors in Puzzle category:

 

Empower your playable ad production with Playturbo

Create

Ready-made templates

Customizable branding

No code required

Learn more

Analyze

In-ad event tracking

View ad interactions, clicks, and conversions

Real-time dashboard

Learn more

Iterate

Edit and resize ads for deployment

Batch edit your ads

Adapt to different channels

Customizable branding

No code required

Learn more
 

Flexible Pricing Models

Playturbo can now support you in producing playables through flexible models:

✅ Spend Share Model

✅ Top-up Model

 

Limited-Time Playturbo Discount (Until June 15!)

We’re now offering exclusive discounts for clients who onboard Playturbo before June 15th.

Unlock Your Discount

If you'd like to explore this further or have any questions, feel free to reach out. Happy to walk you through options or share more samples!

messages.snippet: + how studios are reshaping their midcore strategy in a mature market, with rising CPIs, liveops, D2C and more Gamesforum Focus: Master Mobile Games Marketing with Pro Tips Hi Yossi, Here's what
messages.subject: Mediation Wars: MAX vs LevelPlay, Casual Game Industry Trends and More
messages.textContent:
+ how studios are reshaping their midcore strategy in a mature market, with rising CPIs, liveops, D2C and more

Gamesforum Focus: Master Mobile Games Marketing with Pro Tips (https://d37hdH04.eu1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/2O+113/d37hdH04/VVm84D39zPX5W8m5QFF9bJcjyVfQRxk5wW_SzN5XFYmH3pyd0W7lCdLW6lZ3lFW4tfjtC3P0TPTW77x-c72m4y6kW578Ttk6BBP6wW76sQsr5k-_N_N1VgsB-bfyy_W2xzGLH5mKVyfW4STWG759Q6GNN7Bfk6B_Hct3W7xKh633LBJ-DN6p4-K1NZP-1W31Z8yn1Jb_jlN3rKW8j_wvwmW514qjS9fN_5SW3StFYD3MXVyXW3vccC04KLJ6hW1w8RT-7V21l-W8_V-QZ36GFKPW9fCkbg942606W95mNW66_Dh3fW5Q4r-N5XjtljW1P-PSJ43Xdr3W3CF9-B3fxvzDW4VQ9gc4HcR1lW3XMqS-398DwDf7bcDJ604 )

Hi Yossi,

Here’s what you need to know this week: we dropped our Casual mobile gaming report, packed with data, trends, and billion-dollar case studies. Božo Janković returns with a no-fluff deep dive into who’s really winning the mediation war -  MAX or LevelPlay - backed by fresh data from 368 top games. Plus, Gamesforum Hamburg speakers share their secrets on UA, creative strategy, CRO, and monetization ahead of the event.

Let's dive in 📱👇

LATEST FEATURES

messages.htmlContent:
+ how studios are reshaping their midcore strategy in a mature market, with rising CPIs, liveops, D2C and more

Hi Yossi,

 

Here’s what you need to know this week: we dropped our Casual mobile gaming report, packed with data, trends, and billion-dollar case studies. Božo Janković returns with a no-fluff deep dive into who’s really winning the mediation war -  MAX or LevelPlay - backed by fresh data from 368 top games. Plus, Gamesforum Hamburg speakers share their secrets on UA, creative strategy, CRO, and monetization ahead of the event.

Let's dive in 📱👇

LATEST FEATURES

📊 Casual Mobile Games: A Marketing and Monetization Report

Our latest report breaks down how casual games went from puzzle time-killers to billion-dollar IPs - with data, celebrity campaigns, and the monetization playbooks behind 2025’s top titles.

⚖️ MAX vs. LevelPlay: 9 Mediation Facts That Matter

GameBiz Consulting’s Božo Janković breaks down who’s leading, who’s lagging, and what UA, monetization, and platform dominance really look like in today’s mediation market. 

🗞️ The Roundup: COD: Warzone Discontinued, Tencent's Strong Q1, and Valorant Leaks

Get the scoop on the latest in mobile games this week.

🎯 Midcore Games 2025: Surviving the Squeeze

Gaming Consultant, John Wright, unpacks how rising CPIs, live ops, and D2C are reshaping midcore strategy for studios in a maturing market.

UA ACADEMY

📈 Sebastian Lüdemann on UA That Actually Scales

Welcome to the UA Academy! Our first ever instalment is led by veteran UA & Marketing Consultant, Sebastian Lüdemann, ahead of his Hamburg panel.

 

What's inside this masterclass:

✅ The value of conversion over keyword optimisation
✅ Planning for signal loss with a diverse marketing mix
✅ Adjusting creative approaches to each platform
✅ Importance of product marketing and brand identity

Read more

    PODCAST

    🎙️ Sven Jürgens on Growth, Creatives, and CRO Wins

    Ahead of his talk at Gamesforum Hamburg, Sven Jürgens shares sharp tactics on ASO, team structure, and the untapped power of conversion rate optimisation. Listen now

      MONETIZATION MASTERCLASS

      📈 How to Keep Ad Integrations Running Smoothly and Profitably
      ZiMAD's Head of Ad Monetization shares how they reduce ANR and crash rates, optimise CTR by maintaining technical precision of ad creatives, accurately track ROI and more. Read more

        Until next time,

         

        Mariam Ahmad

        Head of Content

        Gamesforum

          Want to be featured on the next issue of Gamesforum Focus?

          We’d love to hear from you!

          Get in touch

          Gamesforum Limited, 24 Southwark Bridge Road, London, London SE1 9HF, United Kingdom

          Unsubscribe Manage preferences

          Gamesforum Limited, 24 Southwark Bridge Road, London, London SE1 9HF, United Kingdom

          Unsubscribe Manage preferences
